publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4798 Robin Harper: Hungry for Success: Securing the Double Dividend—That the Parliament notes the report published by WWF Scotland, The Footprint of Scotland’s Diet - The environmental burden of what we eat, which sets out the reduction in the ecological footprint that has been achieved by schools through the introduction of healthier menus under the Hungry for Success programme; recognises that a healthy diet can also be better for the planet, and therefore encourages the Scottish Executive to make the links between improvements in nutritional standards and sustainability standards in requirements and guidance which it establishes for all public procurement of food, including the provisions in the Schools (Health Promotion and Nutrition) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Patrick Harvie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
